name: Sheer Cold
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Cryo DMG to the character to which this is attached.
Usage(s):1 (When the character with this attached has Blazing Heat attached to them, remove this effect.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to the character to which this is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>:1</color> (When the character with this attached has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blazing Heat</color> attached to them, remove this effect.)
